Model¶

class StellarSpectra.model.ChebSampler(model, MH_cov, starting_param_dict, order_index=None, plot_name='plots/out_cheb')[source]¶

Subclass of Sampler for evaluating Chebyshev parameters.

class StellarSpectra.model.CovGlobalSampler(model, MH_cov, starting_param_dict, order_index=None, plot_name='plots/out_cov')[source]¶

Subclass of Sampler for evaluating GlobalCovarianceMatrix parameters.

class StellarSpectra.model.CovRegionSampler(model, MH_cov, starting_param_dict, order_index=None, region_index=None, plot_name='plots/out_cov_region')[source]¶

Subclass of Sampler for evaluating RegionCovarianceMatrix parameters.

class StellarSpectra.model.MegaSampler(samplers, burnInCadence, cadence)[source]¶

One Sampler to rule them all

Parameters:
  • samplers (list or tuple of :obj:`model.Sampler`s) – the various Sampler objects to sample
  • cadence (list or tuple) – of sub-iterations per iteration
class StellarSpectra.model.Model(DataSpectrum, Instrument, HDF5Interface, stellar_tuple, cov_tuple, region_tuple)[source]¶

Container class to create and bring together all of the relevant data and models to aid in evaulation.

Parameters:
  • DataSpectrum (spectrum.DataSpectrum object) – the data to fit
  • Instrument (grid_tools.Instrument object) – the instrument with which the data was acquired
  • HDF5Interface (grid_tools.HDF5Interface object) – the interface to the synthetic stellar library
  • stellar_tuple (tuple) – describes the order of parameters. If alpha is missing, :obj:grid_tools.ModelInterpolator is trilinear.
evaluate()[source]¶

Compare the different data and models.

get_data()[source]¶

Returns a DataSpectrum object.

to_json(fname='model.json')[source]¶

Write all of the available parameters to a JSON file so that we may go back and re-create the model

class StellarSpectra.model.RegionsSampler(model, MH_cov, default_param_dict={'sigma': 0.1, 'loga': -14.2, 'h': 0.1}, order_index=None, plot_name='plots/out_cov_region')[source]¶

The point of this sampler is to do all the region sampling for a specific order.

It must also be able to create new samplers.

There will be a list of RegionSamplers, one for each region. This keys into the specific region properly.

There will also be some logic that at the beginning of each iteration of the OrderSampler decides how to manage the RegionSamplerList.

burn_in(iterations)[source]¶

For consistencies’s sake w/ MegaSampler

class StellarSpectra.model.Sampler(model, MH_cov, starting_param_dict, plot_name='plots/out', order_index=None)[source]¶

Helper class designed to be overwritten for StellarSampler, ChebSampler, CovSampler.C

burn_in(iterations)[source]¶

For consistencies’s sake w/ MegaSampler

plot()[source]¶

Generate the relevant plots once the sampling is done.
